main.name: Ben Mosley
main.bio: After getting my Bachelor's in Communication from the University of Tennessee Chattanooga and realizing that industry was not for me, I decided to start to seriously pursue my brewing passion for programming and have already learned so much in my short time at NSS and can't wait to explore more of the exciting world of software development!
main.contactmessage: Feel free to Email, Call, or Text with any additional questions!

education.degree: Bachelor of Arts, Major in Communication

work.title: Full Stack Software Developer
work.description: The first three months consisted of group and individual work on projects on the client side that utilized HTML, CSS, Javascript, React, and JSON. The last three months consisted of learning the server side with a focus on C# and .NET.

work.title: Deli Clerk
work.description: Provided customers with a variety of requested foods. Stocked shelves, organized department, and cleaned various areas.

work.title: Secuirty Guard/Event Staff
work.description: Each event and venue had its own rules and requirements so I was always learning and adapting to new things. I worked a variety of positions including ticket scanning, crowd control, ushering, security and bag checks, assisting patrons, and many other tasks based on whatever positions needed to be covered.
